plain_text:
United States Court of Appeals
For the First Circuit

No. 98-1886

KEVIN P. BEATTY AND CYNTHIA L. BEATTY,

Plaintiffs, Appellants,

           v.

MICHAEL BUSINESS MACHINES CORP.,

  Defendant, Appellee.

     ERRATA SHEET

The opinion of this Court issued on April 20, 1999 is
amended as follows:

On Title Page - delete "[Hon. David M. Cohen, U.S.     
Magistrate Judge]" and insert "[Hon. Gene Carter, U.S.      
District Judge]"
